keyFacts: The document is a financial record related to a PayPal account belonging to Peggy Ugland.
The account was created on June 14, 2013, and is currently open.
The account has a total amount sent of USD 95.50 and no amount received.
Marc Lundberg is noted as a third party associated with the account's address.
The document was generated as part of a law enforcement investigation initiated on August 16, 2019.
